start: echo 'Background agent environment started. Necessary services should be started by terminals if needed.'

terminals.name: dashboard_dev_server
terminals.description: Runs the UI dashboard development server. Access it via the port Vite announces (usually 3000 or 5173 if 3000 is taken).

terminals.name: git_status
terminals.command: git config --list && echo '----- Repository Status -----' && git status && echo '----- Branches -----' && git branch -a
terminals.description: Displays git configuration and repository status for debugging purposes.

terminals.name: log_monitor
terminals.description: Monitors the background agent log file for debugging.
